definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: To explain why, let's dream up a science-fiction transportation system.
sentences.chinese: 为了解释原因，我们设想科幻小说中的交通系统。

sentences.english: How would you like to be the author of the greatest science- fiction story ever written?
sentences.chinese: 你愿意成为有史以来最伟大的科幻小说的作者吗？

sentences.english: It used to be that you could only find the bionic man or woman in science fiction.
sentences.chinese: 过去只能在科幻小说中看到仿生人。

sentences.english: The power of invisibility may soon be more than just a sci-fi fantasy.
sentences.chinese: 隐形能力可能很快使科幻小说中的幻想成为现实。

sentences.english: Well. For what? the science fiction?
In 1851 Verne wrote his first science fiction tale, A voyage in Balloon.
sentences.chinese: 年，凡尔纳完成了第一部科幻小说《气球旅行》。

sentences.english: Zheng Wenguang is widely the father of Chinese science fiction.
sentences.chinese: 郑文广是中国公认的科幻小说之父。

sentences.english: For the moment, mind-reading is still science fiction.
sentences.chinese: 目前，读心仍然只存在于科幻小说。

sentences.english: In my youth dates like that turned up only in science-fiction novels.
sentences.chinese: 我的青年时光，好象只会在科幻小说中才有。

sentences.english: The emergence of science fiction and fantasy genres have spawned a new galaxy of wraiths.
sentences.chinese: 而科幻小说与传奇故事的出现又滋生了一大批鬼魂。

sentences.english: Some ideas were tentative, while others careened into what seemed like science fiction.
sentences.chinese: 有些想法是尝试性的，而有一些却像是科幻小说。

sentences.english: This is hard science-fiction with a reasonably viable method of space travel.
sentences.chinese: 这是带有合理可行的空间旅行方法的硬科幻小说。

sentences.english: Baen Free Library is an online library of downloadable science fiction novels.
sentences.chinese: 是下载科幻小说的一个线上图书馆。

sentences.english: To tell the truth, I'm rather keen on science  fictions.
sentences.chinese: 说实话，我对科幻小说颇有兴趣。

sentences.english: H. G. Wells remains one of the founding fathers of science fiction.
sentences.chinese: 威尔斯是科幻小说的创始人之一。

sentences.english: NO.9 What are some of your favorite sci-fi books, TV shows or movies? —Suzi Beerman, NEWCASTLE, WASH.
sentences.chinese: 你最喜欢的科幻小说，电视剧或者电影都是什么？

definition: science fiction/abbr. for 科學幻想|科学幻想[ke1 xue2 huan4 xiang3]
Isaac Asimov (1920-1992), American author and biochemist
Liu Cixin (1963-), Chinese science fiction writer
"A Brief History of Time" by Stephen Hawking
Around the World in Eighty Days by Jules Verne 儒勒·凡爾納|儒勒·凡尔纳[Ru2 le4 · Fan2 er3 na4]
pinyin: Ba1 shi2 Tian1 Huan2 you2 Di4 qiu2
